	Indicate by check mark whether the registrant is a large accelerated filer, an accelerated filer, a non-accelerated filer or a smaller reporting company. See the definitions of &#8220;large accelerated filer,&#8221; &#8220;accelerated filer&#8221; and &#8220;smaller reporting company&#8221; in Rule&nbsp;12b-2 of the Exchange Act. (Check one):

<EFX_PART_I>
<A NAME="FIS_PART_I"></A>
<P ID=PARA5067 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	PART I
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5068 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<EFX_BUSINESS>
<A NAME="FIS_BUSINESS"></A>
<TABLE ID=TBL5069 STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0PX" CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 BORDER=0>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P ID=PARA4895>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	Item1.
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P ID=PARA4896>
<B>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	BUSINESS.
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P ID=PARA5070 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5071 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	Our Company
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5072 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5073 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	Ignite Restaurant Group,&nbsp;Inc. (referred to herein as the &#8220;Company,&#8221; &#8220;Ignite,&#8221; &#8220;we,&#8221; &#8220;us&#8221; or &#8220;our&#8221;) is a diversified restaurant company that operates a portfolio of two restaurant brands, Joe&#8217;s Crab Shack (&#8220;Joe&#8217;s&#8221;) and Brick House Tavern&nbsp;+&nbsp;Tap (&#8220;Brick House&#8221;). Both of our restaurant brands offer a variety of high-quality food and beverages in a distinctive, casual, high-energy atmosphere, and operate in a diverse set of markets across the United States and internationally. As of December&nbsp;28, 2015, we operated 130&nbsp;Joe&#8217;s and 23 Brick House restaurants in 32 states. In October 2015, our first franchise and our first international location for Joe&#8217;s&nbsp;opened&nbsp;in Dubai, U.A.E.
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5074 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5075 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	The first Joe&#8217;s restaurant was opened in Houston, Texas in 1991. On October 13, 2006, in connection with the purchase by JCS Holdings, LLC, an entity controlled by J.H. Whitney VI, L.P., of 120 Joe&#8217;s restaurants, we changed our name to Joe&#8217;s Crab Shack Holdings, Inc. In 2008, we developed our second brand, Brick House. On July 7, 2009, with the addition of the Brick House brand, we changed our name to Ignite Restaurant Group, Inc. On April 9, 2013, we completed our acquisition of Romano&#8217;s Macaroni Grill (&#8220;Macaroni Grill&#8221;). On April 17, 2015, we completed the sale of Macaroni Grill. Unless specifically stated, all discussions regarding Ignite consolidated operations exclude Macaroni Grill.
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5076 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5077 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	J.H. Whitney VI,&nbsp;L.P., an affiliate of J.H. Whitney Capital Partners,&nbsp;LLC, owns approximately 66.3% of our total outstanding common stock as of December&nbsp;28, 2015.
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5078 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5079 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	Our Restaurants
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5080 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5081 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<I>
<B>
	Joe&#8217;s Crab Shack
</B>
</I>
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5082 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5083 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	Joe&#8217;s is a come-as-you-are, family restaurant that offers guests an environment that is laid-back, comfortable, fun, and energetic. Most locations offer an outdoor patio for guests to enjoy eating and drinking and a children&#8217;s playground as part of the &#8220;I&#8217;m relaxed&#8221; restaurant experience. Joe&#8217;s also has many locations that are located on waterfront property. Interior design elements include a nautical, vacation theme to invoke memories of beach vacations and a genuine crab shack experience. Table tops are decorated with art to prompt dinner conversation, while picnic tables across the patio and interior help guests feel the relaxed tropical vacation experience. Joe&#8217;s restaurants are largely free-standing and average 8,000 square feet with over 200 seats. Most Joe&#8217;s bars are separated from the dining area to provide for a distinct place to grab a drink while waiting for a table. Many of our restaurants also include a small gift shop where guests can purchase souvenirs to commemorate their dining experience. Our current restaurant prototype, introduced in fiscal year 2010, contemporizes many of our key brand elements, while maintaining our authentic crab shack appeal.
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5084 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5085 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	Joe&#8217;s restaurants perform well in targeted markets with high population density and a propensity for seafood, as well as &#8220;destination&#8221; markets with national and regional tourist attractions, both of which are key characteristics of our site selection strategy.
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5086 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5087 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<I>
<B>
	Brick House Tavern&nbsp;+&nbsp;Tap
</B>
</I>
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5088 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5089 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	Brick House is a trend-forward &#8220;next generation bar&nbsp;&amp; grill&#8221; set in an inviting, comfortable and modern venue that provides a distinctive guest experience. Brick House&#8217;s interior d&#233;cor includes custom lighting, dark mahogany woods, open sight lines, HD TVs, and an inviting fireplace. The interior design of Brick House consists of diverse seating and gathering areas where guests can pick multiple ways to enjoy their experience. In addition to a traditional dining room and bar area, Brick House also offers large communal tables and a section of leather recliners positioned in front of large HD TVs, where guests receive their own TV tray for dining. Each restaurant has a state-of-the-art entertainment package and provides guests with a clear line of sight to HD TVs from every seat, making Brick House restaurants an ideal gathering place for sports enthusiasts. Outdoor seating is also available on the patio or around an open fire pit at nearly all locations. Both food and beverages are served by personable and engaging service staff. The typical Brick House restaurant is approximately 8,500 square feet and averages approximately 250 seats, which includes both traditional tables and unique seating options.
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5090 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV ID=PGBK5092 STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<DIV ID=PGFTR5092 STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<DIV ID=PGNUM5092 STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	4
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="HEIGHT: 2PX; WIDTH: 100%; PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS; COLOR: #000000" NOSHADE="">
<A NAME="eolPage5"></A>
<DIV ID=PGHDR5092 STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
</DIV>
<P ID=PARA5092.2 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PX; MARGIN-TOP: 0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
</FONT>
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PX; MARGIN-TOP: 0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	Menu and Menu Development
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5096 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5097 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	We are focused on elevating our high-quality food and beverage offerings. Born out of consumer insights, our in-house Marketing and Culinary departments continually create new food and beverage products for Joe&#8217;s and Brick House, which are intended to exceed guest expectations. A variety of research tools are used to identify opportunities and evaluate current offerings, including a brand-tracker program, segmentation and core menu studies, brand screens, focus groups and in-restaurant surveys. We use a third party econometric consulting firm to provide statistical analysis around pricing, allowing us to make fact-based decisions on pricing and menu engineering.
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5098 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5099 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<I>
<B>
	Joe&#8217;s Crab Shack
</B>
</I>
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5100 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5101 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	Joe&#8217;s aims to offer signature, craveable items to its guests. For example, we have shifted the menu mix at Joe&#8217;s by focusing on entr&#233;es featuring crab over the last several years. Crab is strategically positioned center stage in our menu through the Steampots and Buckets of Crab categories, highlighting the importance of the menu item. Joe&#8217;s Steampots and Buckets of Crab allow guests to choose between seasonal varieties of crab (Queen, Snow, Dungeness and King) and whole lobster. Steampots, our bestselling item, are overflowing with generous portions of crab seasoned to our guest&#8217;s tastes, other seafood, red potatoes, sausage and a fresh ear of corn. Our Buckets of Crab allow guests to pair their favorite crab with several distinctive seasonings ranging from BBQ to Chesapeake Style or Garlic Herb. Joe&#8217;s also leverages its crab-forward menu with other craveable crab items, including Made-From-Scratch Crab Cakes, Crab Nachos and Crazy-Good Crab Dip. As a result of this strategy, entr&#233;es at Joe&#8217;s featuring crab comprise approximately 46% of total food revenues. We believe this crab-focused menu mix has contributed to increases in guest satisfaction, comparable restaurant sales and gross profit dollars. In addition to our core crab-focused menu, Joe&#8217;s also offers a broad range of seafood entr&#233;es like Southern Stuffed Shrimp, Cedar Roast Salmon and Redfish &#8216;N Lobster, plus hand-breaded traditional platters including East Coast Platter and Reel Big Catch. Joe&#8217;s also offers several &#8220;out of water&#8221; options such as Island Steak &amp; Shrimp and Joe&#8217;s Steak Deal. In addition, alcoholic beverages have significantly evolved to support the elevated food strategy, with vacation-style drinks, including the Shark Bite, Category&nbsp;5 Hurricane and Mason Jar cocktails emerging as guests&#8217; top choices.
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5102 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5103 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	Joe&#8217;s menu includes more than 19 items made with Lobster, Queen, Snow, Dungeness, Bairdi or King Crabs sourced from government regulated and sustainable fisheries. Our current menu offers 14 appetizers, including Great Balls of Fire, Crab Nachos and Crazy-Good Crab Dip, and over 50 entr&#233;es, including Steampots, Buckets of Crab, East Coast Platter and several &#8220;out of water&#8221; options. For fiscal year 2015, Joe&#8217;s average check was $25.42, lunch and dinner represented 26% and 74% of revenue, respectively, and revenue distribution was 86% food, 13% alcohol and 1% retail. Prices currently range from $7.49 to $48.99 for items on Joe&#8217;s menu, including appetizers ordered as entr&#233;es and entr&#233;es that are good for more than one person.
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5104 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5105 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	New menu roll-outs occur in April/May and October/November. For all new menu roll-outs, new product launches are combined with a new menu design and updated pricing to reflect the current economic environment, as well as the current strategic marketing and creative plan. A menu change typically includes the introduction of new menu items and recipe enhancements while maintaining a balance of about 75 total menu items, including appetizers. Menu items are added or removed only after thorough testing and analysis, which includes guest satisfaction feedback.
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5106 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5107 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<I>
<B>
	Brick House Tavern&nbsp;+&nbsp;Tap
</B>
</I>
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5108 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5109 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	The Brick House food and beverage menu was created to make the brand feel aspirational while inherently approachable. We believe Brick House&#8217;s elevated menu has &#8220;changed the game&#8221; for the bar and grill customer by offering an innovative premium food selection, along with more than 80 varieties of beer and specialty cocktails made by our bar experts.
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA4897.1 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PX; MARGIN-TOP: 0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV ID=PGBK4897 STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<DIV ID=PGFTR4897 STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<DIV ID=PGNUM4897 STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	5
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="HEIGHT: 2PX; WIDTH: 100%; PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS; COLOR: #000000" NOSHADE="">
<A NAME="eolPage6"></A>
<DIV ID=PGHDR4897 STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
</DIV>
<P ID=PARA4897.2 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PX; MARGIN-TOP: 0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5110 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	Brick House offers its guests a broad selection of scratch-made, chef-inspired, contemporary tavern food. Brick House&#8217;s menu includes 13 appetizers, 38 entr&#233;es, a unique Meatball category (including Greek, buffalo chicken and drunken pork varieties), seasonal daily specials, brunch, dessert and specialty cocktails. Unique handcrafted appetizers include Deviled Eggs, Hickory Smoked Salmon and Duck Wings. Brick House offers an array of burgers, including the Bison Burger, chargrilled and topped with jalape&#241;o cilantro mayo and candied slab bacon. Guests can also choose from a broad selection of homemade entr&#233;es such as Drunken Chops, Prosciutto Wrapped Meatloaf, Chicken&nbsp;&amp; Waffles, our Southern Fried Chicken Sandwich, and our Brick Pizzas. A daily special menu encourages continued innovation with featured items like Chicken Pot Pie and Hand Cut Steak Tips. In addition, Brick House&#8217;s Brick Burgers, including the Gun Show Burger and the Black&nbsp;&amp; Bleu Burger, offer guests a distinct take on the traditional burger. Brick House&#8217;s beverage selection includes imported and domestic beers along with hand-pulled cask beer. Beer is served in vessels unique to our industry such as Brick House&#8217;s signature tap-at-your table beer bongs. All Brick House restaurants have a full bar that supports a variety of liquor drinks, wine and beer cocktails like Fiery Apple Cider and the Shandy as well as specialty cocktails like the Whiskey Smash, Moscow Mule and Basil Gimlet. For fiscal year 2015, Brick House had four full day parts with lunch, afternoon, dinner and late night accounting for 19%, 24%, 40% and 17%, respectively, and Brick House&#8217;s revenue distribution was approximately 60% food and 40% alcohol. Brick House&#8217;s entr&#233;es range in price from $7.00 to $20.00, including appetizers ordered as entr&#233;es.
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5123 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5124 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	Continuous menu innovation is a key strategy for Brick House. We revise the Brick House menu twice a year with design, pricing and product offerings assessed before each menu implementation. New menu offerings are created to reinforce differentiation in our appetizers, entr&#233;es and beverage offerings as part of our effort to provide our guests with exceptional food. Testing of new menu items is executed in-restaurant before a new item is rolled out system-wide.
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5125 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5126 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	Marketing
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5127 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5128 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	Over 75% of our marketing budget is invested in advertising through television (national cable and syndication) and digital advertising (including location-based media, on-demand media as well as in social media), with the balance of the budget being spent on marketing research, in-restaurant advertising, menus and production costs. Our marketing strategy is fact-based, using consumer insights to build brand affinity and drive menu optimization. Our marketing expenditures were 4.7%, 4.5% and 4.6% of revenues for the fiscal years 2015, 2014 and 2013, respectively.
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5129 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5130 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	Joe&#8217;s advertising campaigns typically occur four to six times per year and are annual, seasonal and frequency-focused campaigns aimed at increasing brand awareness, attracting guests and communicating new menu items through quality-focused messaging.
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5131 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5132 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	We engage in a national cable advertising campaign for Joe&#8217;s that currently consists of 26&nbsp;weeks on air. We supplement Joe&#8217;s national advertising with innovative media support, including local TV and radio, social media outreach, location-based mobile media and added-value media. The Joe&#8217;s email club currently has over 900,000 members. Our marketing efforts are aimed at maintaining focus on weekend celebrations and creating weekday value. An example of our weekday value proposition was the introduction of All-You-Can-Eat Crab on Wednesdays.
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5133 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5134 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	Brick House&#8217;s marketing efforts are focused on menu innovation and local marketing initiatives. Local marketing includes events such as bike nights and pint nights. Digital advertising, social media and public relations have been used to support initiatives around March Madness, football season, menu launches, brunch, happy hour and late night.
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5137 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV ID=PGBK5138 STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<DIV ID=PGFTR5138 STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<DIV ID=PGNUM5138 STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	6
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="HEIGHT: 2PX; WIDTH: 100%; PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS; COLOR: #000000" NOSHADE="">
<A NAME="eolPage7"></A>
<DIV ID=PGHDR5138 STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
</DIV>
<P ID=PARA5138.2 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PX; MARGIN-TOP: 0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5141 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	Experienced Management Team
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5142 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5143 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	Our experienced team of industry veterans has an average of over 20&nbsp;years of experience with restaurant companies such as Outback Steakhouse, T.G.I. Friday&#8217;s, Darden, Applebee&#8217;s, Landry&#8217;s, Hard Rock Caf&#233;, Dunkin&#8217; Brands and Yum! Brands. Our management team is led by Robert S. Merritt, our Chief Executive Officer, who joined us in November 2015. Mr.&nbsp;Merritt&#8217;s career in the restaurant industry has spanned over three decades. He was a former President and Chief Executive Officer of Benjamin Moore &amp; Co. Prior to that, he was an original member of the senior management team of Outback Steakhouse (currently, Bloomin&#8217; Brands, Inc.) where he oversaw their initial public offering and helped to expand the company&#8217;s initial operations from five restaurants in Florida in 1990 to over 1,250 restaurants in 22 countries by his retirement from the company in 2005. Mr. Merritt currently serves on the board of directors for Ruth&#8217;s Hospitality Group, Inc. The experience of our management team has allowed us to transform Joe&#8217;s into a market leader in the casual dining seafood category while simultaneously developing and launching Brick House.
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5144 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5145 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	Guest Satisfaction
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5146 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5147 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	We use third party vendors to systematically gather, record and analyze key guest data for all of our brands. Our marketing research tools include:
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5148 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE ID=TBL5152 STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0PX" CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 BORDER=0>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: MIDDLE">
<P ID=PARA5149 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 3%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P ID=PARA5150 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&#8226;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 93%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P ID=PARA5151 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	AAU, or attitude, awareness and usage surveys;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P ID=PARA5153 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE ID=TBL5157 STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0PX" CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 BORDER=0>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: MIDDLE">
<P ID=PARA5154 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

<P ID=PARA5155 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">

</FONT>
</P>

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 93%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P ID=PARA5156 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	third party guest satisfaction surveys;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P ID=PARA5158 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE ID=TBL5162 STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0PX" CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 BORDER=0>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: MIDDLE">
<P ID=PARA5159 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 3%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P ID=PARA5160 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&#8226;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 93%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P ID=PARA5161 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	annual core menu studies; and
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P ID=PARA5163 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5164 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	We use the insights gathered from market research and data analytics to support strategic and tactical decisions. We embrace and rely on the use of market research as a tool to better understand our business and drive improved performance. These market research and data analytics provide us with critical guest feedback that guide us to change or refine individual menu items and implement operational initiatives to drive positive results on &#8220;Satisfaction,&#8221; &#8220;Likely to Return&#8221; and &#8220;Likely to Recommend&#8221; metrics. Our AAU also guides us on changes to perception and awareness of our brands when considering shifts in our marketing and advertising strategies and tactics. We believe improved performance of our menu items, in our restaurants and in the effectiveness of our advertising is driven by understanding guest feedback and making changes accordingly.
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5165 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5166 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	In mid-2015, we moved away from traditional guest satisfaction surveys to a tool that compiles social listening into real time analytics to provide us with organic, &#8220;of-the-moment&#8221; insights into our guests&#8217; experiences. We believe that this customer experience management tool will help us improve brand loyalty and acquire new customers.
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5167 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5168 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	Restaurant Operations
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5169 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5170 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	While our brands have independent field operations, we maintain a shared services platform, which handles many of the administrative functions for both Joe&#8217;s and Brick House. The Operations department is currently headed by our Chief Operating Officer (&#8220;COO&#8221;) who handles both brands. Reporting to the COO are department heads for operations, marketing, culinary, and recruiting, training and operations support. We believe this provides a scalable infrastructure, which will allow us to efficiently adapt as our business changes and increase our profitability.
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5171 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5172 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<I>
<B>
	Joe&#8217;s Crab Shack
</B>
</I>
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5173 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5174 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	Joe&#8217;s operations are led by two regional vice presidents. Each regional vice president oversees six to seven directors of operations, who typically manage 8 to 15 restaurants. Restaurant-level management at Joe&#8217;s typically includes a general manager, a quality assurance manager, a restaurant manager and flex managers, as required. The flex manager is an hourly employee that is properly trained and may be called upon to perform a managerial role. Each restaurant also has a brand ambassador that coordinates with members of the local community on behalf of Joe&#8217;s for group sales and fundraisers. Our restaurant managers have bonus incentives that are based on sales and restaurant-level profits.
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5175 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV ID=PGBK5178 STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<DIV ID=PGFTR5178 STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<DIV ID=PGNUM5178 STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	7
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="HEIGHT: 2PX; WIDTH: 100%; PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS; COLOR: #000000" NOSHADE="">
<A NAME="eolPage8"></A>
<DIV ID=PGHDR5178 STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
</DIV>
<P ID=PARA5178.2 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PX; MARGIN-TOP: 0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5181 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	Joe&#8217;s manager training program is designed to train and educate managers at all levels, from the hourly flex manager to general manager. This comprehensive program is up to eight weeks in length, depending on the knowledge base and skill level of the trainee, and is both classroom and on-the-job based. Our certified trainer training program is designed to develop hourly training specialists that reside in a restaurant or market to oversee the training programs in that area. To become a certified trainer, candidates must be a fully validated hourly team member with recommendations from their general manager and director of operations. Through the training process, both hourly and management trainees will attend classroom sessions, take examinations, watch videos and work alongside a certified trainer or a highly recommended individual that reports back to the certified trainer on performance and progress. Because Joe&#8217;s is committed to the responsible service of alcohol, we have developed an in-house certification program that educates our restaurant personnel on the responsible service of alcoholic beverages. All team members are required to complete this certification bi-annually.
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5182 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5183 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<I>
<B>
	Brick House Tavern&nbsp;+&nbsp;Tap
</B>
</I>
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5184 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5185 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	The Brick House team has one regional vice president who oversees four directors of operations who, in turn, each manage six to seven restaurants. Typical restaurant management includes a general manager, a service manager, an executive chef and an executive beverage manager. Brick House restaurant managers have bonus incentives that are based on sales and restaurant-level profits.
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5186 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5187 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	Our training programs are eight weeks for all salaried managers and one to two weeks for all hourly positions. Our new hire training program is conducted by in-house trainers who have been certified by our restaurant lead trainer. At the end of training, there is a comprehensive test and an on-the-job training validation that must be completed before team members are allowed to work independently. Because Brick House is committed to the responsible service of alcohol, we have developed an in-house certification program that educates our restaurant personnel.
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5188 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5189 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	Shared Services
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5190 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5191 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	Our brands are supported by our Restaurant Support Center (&#8220;RSC&#8221;) located in Houston, Texas. The RSC provides support services to both brands including accounting, real estate and development, human resources, legal, purchasing and information systems. We believe our RSC allows us to leverage our scale and share best practices across key functional areas that are common to all of our brands.
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5192 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5193 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	Site Selection
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5194 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5195 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	We focus our development strategy for Joe&#8217;s on new locations in narrowly defined geographic regions with high population density and a propensity for seafood and in close proximity to regional and national tourist attractions. Our development strategy for Brick House is largely intended to focus on opening new locations in the top 50 designated market areas across the country. We have a dedicated development team that takes an analytical, data-driven approach to selecting new sites, which is largely based upon, but not limited to, the following criteria:
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5196 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE ID=TBL5200 STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0PX" CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 BORDER=0>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: MIDDLE">
<P ID=PARA5197 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

<P ID=PARA5198 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&#8226;
</FONT>
</P>

<P ID=PARA5199 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	with respect to Joe&#8217;s, attractiveness of locations from a regional/national and/or &#8220;destination market&#8221; perspective;
</FONT>

<P ID=PARA5219.2 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PX; MARGIN-TOP: 0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

<TABLE ID=TBL5245 STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0PX" CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 BORDER=0>

	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE ID=TBL5250 STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0PX" CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 BORDER=0>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: MIDDLE">
<P ID=PARA5247 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 3%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P ID=PARA5248 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&#8226;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 93%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P ID=PARA5249 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	development and expansion constraints.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P ID=PARA5251 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5252 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	Restaurant Development and Economics
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5253 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5254 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	During 2015, we opened two Brick House restaurants, which were conversions from Macaroni Grill restaurants. Our capital investment, which includes build-out costs and cash pre-opening costs, amounted to $8.6&nbsp;million for restaurants opened in 2015. Factors contributing to the fluctuation in capital investment per location include size of the property, geographical location, type of construction, cost of liquor and other licenses, and concessions received from landlords. Conversions of other existing restaurants to Joe&#8217;s or Brick House typically require less capital investment than newly developed and built restaurants. During the past three fiscal years, we have converted five Macaroni Grill restaurants to Brick House restaurants, two Brick House restaurants to Joe&#8217;s restaurants, and two Joe&#8217;s restaurants to Brick House restaurants.
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5255 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5256 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	We target steady state new restaurant average unit volumes of approximately $3.9&nbsp;million for Joe&#8217;s and $3.2&nbsp;million for Brick House. We also enter into new restaurant development with planned cash-on-cash returns, which is defined as restaurant-level profit per store divided by total build-out costs and cash pre-opening costs, to exceed our cost of capital. For fiscal year 2016, we target opening as many as four new restaurants, including three conversions.
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5257 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5258 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	Performance of any new restaurant location will usually differ from its originally targeted performance due to a variety of factors, and these differences may be material. New restaurants typically encounter significant guest traffic and high sales in their initial months, which may decrease over time. Furthermore, average sales volumes of our new restaurants are impacted by a range of risks and uncertainties beyond our control, including those described under the caption &#8220;Risk Factors.&#8221;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5259 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5260 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	Purchasing and Distribution
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5261 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5262 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	Our dedicated purchasing team sources, negotiates and purchases all food supplies, operating supplies, and all restaurant equipment, furniture and fixtures. We have developed an extensive network of suppliers, with many relationships dating back over many years. We maintain relationships with many suppliers and have the ability to shift purchasing among suppliers, should more favorable terms become available in the market. In addition, we maintain multiple approved suppliers for all key components of our menu to mitigate risk and ensure supply. Suppliers are chosen based upon their ability to provide (i)&nbsp;a continuous supply of product that meets all safety and quality specifications, (ii)&nbsp;logistics expertise and freight management, (iii)&nbsp;product innovation, (iv)&nbsp;customer service, (v)&nbsp;transparency of business relationship and (vi)&nbsp;competitive pricing. Specified products are distributed to all restaurants through a national distribution company under a negotiated contract. This distributor delivers products directly to our restaurants either two or three times per week depending on restaurant requirements. Produce is purchased locally from an approved supplier network to maximize operating efficiencies and to ensure freshness and product quality.
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA4898.1 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PX; MARGIN-TOP: 0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV ID=PGBK4898 STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<DIV ID=PGFTR4898 STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<DIV ID=PGNUM4898 STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	9
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="HEIGHT: 2PX; WIDTH: 100%; PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS; COLOR: #000000" NOSHADE="">
<A NAME="eolPage10"></A>
<DIV ID=PGHDR4898 STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
</DIV>
<P ID=PARA4898.2 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PX; MARGIN-TOP: 0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
</FONT>
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P ID=PARA5274 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	Historically, our top selling menu items are based on Queen Crab, Snow Crab, Dungeness Crab, King Crab, whole lobster and shrimp, which collectively accounted for approximately 45% to 50% of our total food purchases in previous fiscal years. We have established long-term relationships with key seafood vendors and usually source product directly from producers to get advantageous product access at the most competitive prices. As market conditions warrant, we can use these relationships to lock in forward pricing for six to 18&nbsp;months. Pricing agreements are entered into for a minimum volume of product and are structured around current and historical prices and the projected menu mix. We employ a team at the RSC that is solely responsible for actively managing these contracts, which typically roll on a continuous basis.
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5276 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5275 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	In addition to using fixed price contracts, our Joe&#8217;s menu provides inherent flexibility to help manage food cost. Crab is deliberately placed center stage as a defining item to the Joe&#8217;s experience. Joe&#8217;s Steampot and Buckets of Crab offerings allow guests to choose between four varieties of crabs (Queen, Snow, Dungeness and King) and lobster. Each of these species has multiple fisheries and seasons. Besides the ability to direct guests to other crab varieties, Steampots, the top selling item on the menu, provide additional product flexibility. The Steampot is a variety of both shellfish and non-seafood items served together in a simmering pot that have individual ingredients that can be adjusted based on prevailing market prices and general input availability. We believe this strategy greatly reduces our reliance on individual inputs and is largely opaque to the guest. Moreover, should input prices increase, we have the ability to adjust menu prices very quickly, even within a few days, if appropriate.
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5277 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5278 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	Crab is harvested during seasons and in accordance with regulations which are determined by various regulatory agencies. The master distributor fulfills restaurant orders by delivering crab, which our restaurants store until preparation for service to the guest. We believe our strong supplier relationships, coupled with the inherent flexibility of our menu, minimizes our exposure to seafood supply chain shortages and market price increases. Cost of sales as a percentage of revenues for fiscal year 2015, 2014 and 2013 were 31.4%, 32.5% and 30.8%, respectively. In fiscal year 2015, our top three suppliers accounted for approximately 33% of our total food purchases.
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5279 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5280 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	Food Safety
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5281 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5282 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	We have food safety and quality assurance programs which are designed to ensure that our restaurant team members and managers are trained in proper food handling techniques. Our restaurants operate in various municipalities, which require us to have systems in place to adhere to various local standards. With the goal of achieving industry leadership in the area of restaurant food safety and sanitation, we have implemented a national operating standard, which includes comprehensive, unannounced inspections by a third party service provider. Restaurant managers receive feedback and coaching as an integral part of the semi-annual visits to each restaurant.
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5283 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5284 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	We require all of our suppliers to adhere to strict Hazard Analysis and Critical Control Points, or HACCP, quality control and environmental standards in the development, harvest, catch, and production of food products. We require chemical, physical and microbiological testing of seafood and other commodities for conformance to safety and quality requirements.
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5285 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5286 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	All potential suppliers are required to meet our specified minimum standards to achieve approved supplier status for the Ignite system.
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA4899.1 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PX; MARGIN-TOP: 0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV ID=PGBK4899 STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<DIV ID=PGFTR4899 STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<DIV ID=PGNUM4899 STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	10
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="HEIGHT: 2PX; WIDTH: 100%; PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS; COLOR: #000000" NOSHADE="">
<A NAME="eolPage11"></A>
<DIV ID=PGHDR4899 STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
</DIV>
<P ID=PARA4899.2 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PX; MARGIN-TOP: 0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5305 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	Information Systems and Restaurant Reporting
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5306 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5307 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	All of our restaurants use computerized management information systems, which are designed to improve operating efficiencies, provide restaurant and RSC management with timely access to financial and operating data, and reduce administrative time and expense. Our integrated management information systems platform is a combination of in-house and outsourced systems. The major management information systems are divided by function:
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5308 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE ID=TBL5312 STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0PX" CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 BORDER=0>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: MIDDLE">
<P ID=PARA5309 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 3%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P ID=PARA5310 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&#8226;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 93%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P ID=PARA5311 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	restaurant point-of-sale;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P ID=PARA5313 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

<TD STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PX; WIDTH: 4%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: MIDDLE; MARGIN-TOP: 0PX">

	restaurant back-of-house;
</FONT>

<P ID=PARA5318 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">

<TABLE ID=TBL5327 STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0PX" CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 BORDER=0>

<P ID=PARA5324 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
